Attacks.Name: Hydro Cannon
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away M distance from Blastoise.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Jet
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Blastoise may make an immediate move action.

Attacks.Name: Water Spout
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 2 of the target character.

Superpowers.Name: Torrential Shell
Superpowers.Effect: For the rest of the turn, add 2 dice to Blastoise's defense rolls and gain 2 power. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Rapid Spin
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from Blastoise and make an immediate move action.

Attacks.Name: Skull Bash
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Shell Fortress
Superpowers.Effect: Blastoise gains the Impenetrable Shell special condition, reducing damage from all attacks by 1 and gaining immunity to the Stun and Freeze conditions for the rest of the game. This superpower can be used only once per game.
